contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 24, 2011 D Yamaha Swiss Open Contest
Swiss Open 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
swiss-open
Swiss Open Contest presented nearly 50 different Bands from 11 Countries in it's 25 Years of History till 2014. It was held in Kultur-Casino Bern first and since 1999 the 'Salle Blanche' in KKL Luzern provides a wonderful Frame for this popular Event.
See Also Contest Website: http://www.worldbandfestival.ch/ Switzerland
Set Test and Own Choice
The Torchbearer
Kultur und Kongresszentrum (KKL), Luzern, Switzerland Best performance of contest march: Brass Band Luzerner Hinterland Best performance of own choice overture: Ensemble de Cuivres Valaisan
April 15, 2011, 12:45 p.m. Sept. 24, 2014, 12:35 p.m.
1 Brassband Bürgermusik Luzern Michael Bach Benvenuto Cellini [arr. Jenkins]
2 Wallberg Brass Band Garry Cutt The Force of Destiny (La Forza del Destino) - Overture [arr. F. Wright]
3 Ensemble de Cuivres Valaisan Jean-François Bobillier The Corsair
4 Brass Band Luzern Land Herve Grelat Norma
5 Entlebucher Brass Band Patrick Ottiger The Flying Dutchman [arr. Lorriman]
6 Jugend Brass Band Michelsamt Corsin Tuor Le Roi d'Ys
7 Opera Brass Albert Benz Carnival Overture [Dvořák, arr. Brand]
8 Brass Band Fribourg Allan Withington Le Carnaval Romain [arr. Wright]
9 Oberaargauer Brass Band Armin Renggli Les Vêpres Siciliennes [arr. Lorriman]
10 Ensemble de Cuivres Jurassien Blaise Héritier Le Domino Noir [unknown arranger]
11 Ensemble de Cuivres Melodia Yvan Lagger Il Barbiere di Siviglia [arr. Lorriman]
